text:
Hi,

I am facing a critical error,My application is about to move to Production it 
is running on AIX 5.1 recently we upgraded the IHS 1.3.12.6 to IHS 2.0.42.2 
After this Upgrade we are getting a strange error.When we request a page some 
times it is displaying some times it is showing a blang page error code 400 
page can not be displayed.That time when we refresh the page then it executes 
and displays the correct page.Please help me in this.Thanks in Advance.

Vijay
creator: vkandika@in.ibm.com
